txt.en: 'We stand with Lainedhal, an elf of Rivendell, in the Ettenmoors as part of the Coldfells Army. Angmar rises once more and we stand against them.'
'I have word from the Ettenmoors. Lainedhel reports that the Orcs have claimed the Grimwood Lumber Camp.'
'I have news of the battle in the Ettenmoors. Lainedhel's forces have lost the Grimwood Lumber Camp.'
'Battle in the Ettenmoors sours as the Orcs claim the Grimwood Lumber Camp.'
'Battle in the Ettenmoors goes poorly. Lugazag, the tower in the west is held by the forces of Angmar.'
'Orcs and trolls swarmed the Grimwood Lumber Camp and claimed the post as their own. Battle in the Ettenmoors sours once more.'
'Battle in the Ettenmoors spoils. Orcs lay claim to Tirith Rhaw!'
'Lainedhel's forces failed to hold off the enemy onslaught at the Isendeep Mine. Orcs and trolls have claimed the location.'
'A recent battle at the Isendeep Mine ended with the Coldfells Army in retreat, overwhelmed by the numbers sent by Angmar.'
'Word from the Ettenmoors! Lugazag, the western tower is controlled by Orcs from Angmar!'
'Battle in the Ettenmoors sours, friend. Lainedhel's forces let Tirith Rhaw slip beneath the shadow of Angmar!'
'If your arm be ready, your aim be true and your heart be strong, I bid you aid Captain-General Lainedhal against the forces of Angmar at Lugazag in the Ettenmoors.'
'The lumber camp in the Ettenmoors falls to the forces of Angmar, more are needed to assist the Coldfells Army.'
'Captain-General Lainedhal reports that the tower, Lugazag in the Ettenmoors is under the sway of Angmar.'
'Tol Ascarnen fell sway to the forces of Angmar. Lainedhel's forces may not be enough.'
'Ettenmoors fighting goes poorly. Lainedhel reports that Orcs have taken Tol Ascarnen.'
'I have news from the Ettenmoors. Angmar's Orcs stormed Tol Ascarnen and took hold of the fortress.'
'Coldfells forces fled the Grimwood Lumber Camp as Angmar's army drove them from the location.'
'We await news from Lainedhel. Last we heard, the Grimwood Lumber Camp fell to the sway of Angmar.'
'The Coldfells Army has lost control of the Grimwood Lumber Camp.'
'Lainedhel sends word that Lugazag is under Angmar's shadow. We must fight this tide back!'
'Word from the Ettenmoors is bleak. Lugazag is controlled by Orcs out of Angmar!'
'Lainedhal's forces suffered a defeat at the Grimwood Lumber Camp.'
'Battle in the Ettenmoors led to the fall of Tol Ascarnen. Now the keep is covered in Orcs and trolls from Angmar.'
'The Ettenmoors sees many fall in a failed defence of Tol Ascarnen. Lainedhel wants more to heed his call.'
'Angmar's forces drove far to the east in the Ettenmoors and laid claim to Tirith Rhaw.'
'Lainedhel's forces suffered a loss at the Isendeep Mine when a force of Orcs from Angmar claimed the post.'
'A battle in the Ettenmoors saw the forces of Angmar lay claim to the Isendeep Mine there. Lainedhel has called for immediate reprisal.'
'The mine within the Ettenmoors falls beneath the shadow of the north. Orcs control the mine and the precious ore within.'
'The Isendeep falls to Angmar's forces.'
'The Isendeep has fallen to Angmar's forces. Lainedhal requests more to the north.'
'Lainedhel's forces failed to hold off the enemy onslaught at the Isendeep Mine. Orcs and trolls have claimed the location.'
'Orcs! Orcs claim the tower at the western edge of the Ettenmoors. Lainedhel's forces must reclaim this post!'
'A recent battle at the Isendeep Mine ended with the Coldfells Army in retreat, overwhelmed by the numbers sent by Angmar.'
'Battle standards at Tol Ascarnen fell and were replaced by the standards of Angmar. The citadel fell to the Orcs.'
'Battle rages in the Ettenmoors. The Coldfells Army gathers to stand against the tide of Angmar!'
'Lainedhal's forces suffer a great loss. Tirith Rhaw fell to Orcs and trolls out of Angmar.'
'A recent battle at Tol Ascarnen, in the Ettenmoors, drove the Coldfells army from the site.'
'Word arrives from the north. Lainedal suffered a terrible defeat at the eastern tower of Tirith Rhaw.'
'Tirith Rhaw has fallen. Angmar's forces control the tower now.'
'Battle in the Ettenmoors sours, friend. Lainedhel's forces suffered a great loss as Orcs laid claim to Tol Ascarnen.'
'Orcs and trolls drove the Coldfells Army from the Isendeep Mine in the Ettenmoors. Lainedhel has called for aide.'
'Lainedhel reports a failed attempt to claim the Isendeep Mine in the Ettenmoors. Orcs and trolls still control this pivotal location.'
'Tirith Rhaw in the Ettenmoors falls beneath the shadow of the north. Orcs and trolls stalk her walls now.'
'Tol Ascarnen, the central fortress in the Ettenmoors, fell to Orcs!'
'Orcs and trolls encroached ever closer to Gl√¢n Vraig in the Ettenmoors when they claimed Tirith Rhaw.'
'If you seek battle, speak with Rimdal here in Rivendell. Captain-General Lainedhal leads the Free People against the forces of Angmar in the Ettenmoors!'
